title: Kuroko no Basket: Baka ja Katenai no yo! (Kuroko's Basketball OVA)
synopsis: Bundled with the 25th volume of Kuroko no Basket manga. The anime based on the Baka Ja Katenai no yo (バカじゃ勝てないのよ) story that was featured in the manga's fifth volume.
